front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for the Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol

abstract.t: This specification defines an extension to the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with SNMP-based network management. In particular, it defines objects for configuring, monitoring, and controlling routers that employ the Virtual Router Redundancy Protocol (VRRP).
This memo specifies a MIB module in a manner that is compliant with SMIv2, and semantically identical to the SMIv1 definitions.
